Name: Bee Balm
Description: Small edible flowers that attract bees, butterflies, and hummingbirds!

DescriptionLocalization.es: Pequeñas flores comestibles que atraen abejas, mariposas y colibríes.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 벌, 나비, 벌새를 유혹하는 작은 식용 꽃들!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Diese Pflanze kann bis zu 4Fuß groß werden.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Pequenas flores comestíveis que atraem abelhas, borboletas e beija-flores!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 小的可食用的花，吸引蜜蜂，蝴蝶，和蜂鸟！
